name: dotfiles
description: CLI for setting up personal dev environment

scripts.get-shell-settings: cp ~/.zshrc ./assets/zshrc && cp ~/.hyper.js ./assets/hyper.js && cp ~/.aliases ./assets/aliases && cp ~/.vimrc ./assets/vimrc && cp $HOME/Library/Application\ Support/Code/User/settings.json ./assets/ && cp $HOME/Library/Application\ Support/Code/User/keybindings.json ./assets/
